name: Color Rotate
description:
Color Rotate

Color Rotate is a basic platformer with a focus on rotation. You control a cube that rotates when it jumps, but cannot land on tiles that do not match your cube's edge color. The only way to rotate is to jump, and the only button you have is to jump; play carefully. The game is short, and filled with checkpoints, which briefly stop the gameplay, and also double as a chance to re-orient yourself however you want.

Second place winner of STEM Fuse Educate's GOT GAME Spring 2021 Student Competition.
